Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: I stop in here often when arriving early from the US before my hotel room is open. I usually start with a cup of coffee, then toast and eggs. It is very quiet and comforting. Staff is very friendly and patient.

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: We went there to have breakfast almost every day of our Amsterdam holidays. The breakfasts are worth their money. Hearty scrambled eggs and great croissants.  The orange juice is freshly made and really good. And the service is just lovely, everyone is nice and friendly. We loved it.

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: I really wish I could give this place more than 5 stars because their cheese burger is by far the best piece of food I have ever put into my mouth. Their food in general is incredible! The staff were so lovely and accommodating to us as â€¦

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Super friendly staff. Me, and my partner felt incredibly welcome. Chatty, asked us how our day was etc. Food was reasonably priced and very delicious. What more could you want?

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Perfect place to try if you've got a crepe craving, but be warned, the loaded crepes can have a lot of sugar. I felt really sick after the nutella, strawberry, whipped cream one, but let's be honest that's my fault for ordering it. Otherwise it's decent place for breakfast. Stark but friendly interior and polite staff.

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Every year, for the past 3 years, this owner closes his shop to harass and beat gay men waiting in queue for the club next door. This year, he brought  a woman to hit guys with her motor bike and a very large man to push and hit guys until â€¦

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Our new secret breakfast spot! Excellent and very cozy! Continental Breakfast & Nutella Pancake...and the fresh orange juice...just perfect :)

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Incredible! We loved it! We ordered 2 pancakes and coffee and they were delicious! You should try it. The personal was also very kind and friendly. 100% recommended!!

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text:
All people from the staff were fantastic.
We had lunches and lot of breakfasts with their extraordinary pancakes.
Generally all food is good and not so expensive.
To be experienced!

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Food was ok, with a good price. We paid 4 euros for the "big" orange juice, but in fact the cup was not what I would judge as "big". Staff is friendly and service is fast.

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: It is very good. Food was warm and yummy !

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Came here for breakfast, extremely nice staff and got our food very fast. Breakfast looked smaller than expected when it first arrived but was enough to fill me up which I was happy about and the prices were reasonable

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Closed when we went by there at 18:16, only giving fewer stars so you can be aware that the opening times on Google might be wrong. They had no opening hours on the door. â€¦

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Nice decor, cheap but don't expect the best breakfeat of your life. Worth the bucks though. Croissants are very buttery, which is awesome.

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Can't recommend this place enough. Amazing food and lovely staff. Very welcoming

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Decent pancakes and English breakfast. There wasn't a wait at 1pm, and we were served promptly.

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Great pancakes and coffee. Decent omelettes and sub-par club sandwich.

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Excellent pancakes. Would have given five stars, except they got my order wrong.

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Very small inside but the food and service is Great, would go back again

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Overpriced and unremarkable. I ordered the continental and the bacon was dry and bland.

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: The food is average, and the staff is not very welcoming.

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Great pancakes! Perfecto place for a breakfast!

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Worst club sandwich ever for expensive 10â‚¬. Would never come back.

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Tomato soup was excellent, service was very prompt.

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Very good restaurant, great hamburger.

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Ok

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Food poison.. Now it's a chicken place

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Great service and friendly staff. We came for breakfast, prices are a little expensive but the food is delicious and the portion is more than enough for one person. Orange juice is fresh made and the cafe latte is really good! Menu is available in English.

Name: De Sneeker Pan
Review Text: Really good home made food

Review Text: Lovely place
